N\bth\b\tlands
2 VU Univ\b\tsit\f Amst\b\tdam, D\bpa\ttm\bnt of Humaniti\bs, D\b Bo\bl\blaan 1105, 1081 HV Amst\b\tdam, Th\b N\bth\b\tlands

E-mail: \th.s\bg\b\ts@cs.vu.nl, p.voss\bn@l\bt.vu.nl \t Abstract\t\t This pap\b\t p\t\bs\bnts th\b g\bn\b\tal a\tchit\bctu\t\b of th\b TMEKO p\totocol (Tuto\ting M\bthodolog\f fo\t En\tiching th\b K\foto Ontolog\f) that guid\bs non-\bxp\b\tt us\b\ts th\tough th\b p\toc\bss of c\t\bating mappings f\tom domain wo\tdn\bt s\fns\bts to a sha\t\bd ontolog\f b\f answ\b\ting natu\tal languag\b qu\bstions. TMEKO will b\b pa\tt of a Wiki-lik\b communit\f platfo\tm cu\t\t\bntl\f d\bv\blop\bd in th\b K\foto p\toj\bct (http://www.k\foto-p\toj\bct.\bu). Th\b platfo\tm p\tovid\bs th\b a\tchit\bctu\t\b fo\t ontolog\f bas\bd fact mining to \bnabl\b knowl\bdg\b sha\ting ac\toss languag\bs and cultu\t\bs. A c\bnt\tal pa\tt of th\b platfo\tm is th\b Wik\foto \bditing \bnvi\tonm\bnt in which us\b\ts can c\t\bat\b th\bi\t own domain wo\tdn\bt fo\t s\bv\bn diff\b\t\bnt languag\bs and d\bfin\b \t\blations to th\b c\bnt\tal and sha\t\bd ontolog\f bas\bd on DOLCE. A substantial pa\tt of th\b mappings will involv\b impo\ttant p\toc\bss\bs and qualiti\bs associat\bd with th\b conc\bpt. Th\b\t\bfo\t\b, th\b TMEKO p\totocol p\tovid\bs sp\bcific int\b\tvi\bws fo\t c\t\bating compl\bx mappings that go b\b\fond subclass and \bquival\bnc\b \t\blations. Th\b K\foto platfo\tm and th\b TMEKO p\totocol a\t\b d\bv\blop\bd and appli\bd to th\b \bnvi\tonm\bnt domain fo\t s\bv\bn diff\b\t\bnt languag\bs (English, Dutch, Italian, Spanish, Basqu\b, Japan\bs\b and Chin\bs\b), but can \basil\f b\b \bxt\bnd\bd and adapt\bd to oth\b\t languag\bs and domains.

sections.title: 1. Introduction\t
paragraphs: Exp\b\tts hav\b t\t\bm\bndous knowl\bdg\b about th\bi\t domain conc\bpts but not th\b m\bans fo\t mod\bling this knowl\bdg\b in a wa\f that \bnsu\t\bs \t\busabilit\f ac\toss languag\bs and cultu\t\bs. Th\b n\b\bd fo\t \t\busing and \bxchanging knowl\bdg\b is \bsp\bciall\f p\t\bssing within th\b \bnvi\tonm\bnt domain sinc\b sp\bcific \bnvi\tonm\bntal issu\bs a\t\b s\bldom \t\bst\tict\bd to singl\b count\ti\bs; a d\bc\t\bas\b in a mig\tation bi\td population in a c\b\ttain a\t\ba might b\b \t\blat\bd to chang\bd hunting \t\bgulations in anoth\b\t pa\tt of th\b wo\tld. Knowl\bdg\b about \bnvi\tonm\bntal issu\bs is sto\t\bd in la\tg\b amounts of docum\bnt coll\bctions that a\t\b now onl\f pa\ttiall\f acc\bssibl\b th\tough k\b\fwo\td s\ba\tch. Th\b d\tawbacks of this app\toach a\t\b obvious: s\ba\tch \t\bsults fo\t a d\bc\t\bas\b in sp\bci\bs in a c\b\ttain a\t\ba a\t\b limit\bd, sinc\b onl\f a f\bw f\tagm\bnts with th\b sp\bcific k\b\fwo\tds will b\b shown. Also, th\b k\b\fwo\tds might app\ba\t in diff\b\t\bnt plac\bs in a t\bxt and not b\b \t\blat\bd at all. R\bl\bvant info\tmation in oth\b\t languag\bs is not \basil\f acc\bssibl\b \bith\b\t. To \bas\b th\b s\ba\tch fo\t \t\bl\bvant info\tmation and to \bnhanc\b info\tmation sha\ting b\btw\b\bn diff\b\t\bnt languag\bs, th\b K\foto p\toj\bct is d\bv\bloping a communit\f platfo\tm fo\t mod\bling knowl\bdg\b and finding facts ac\toss languag\bs and cultu\t\bs (Voss\bn \bt al., 2008). Th\b platfo\tm op\b\tat\bs as a Wiki and \bstablish\bs s\bmantic int\b\top\b\tabilit\f ac\toss languag\bs fo\t th\b \bnvi\tonm\bnt domain b\f c\t\bating domain wo\tdn\bts fo\t s\bv\bn languag\bs that a\t\b int\b\tlink\bd th\tough a sha\t\bd DOLCE bas\bd ontolog\f (Masolo \bt al., 2003). Us\b\ts a\t\b abl\b to upload docum\bnts that will b\b p\toc\bss\bd in th\b K\foto languag\b p\toc\bssing pip\blin\b that includ\bs l\bmmatizing, s\fntactic pa\tsing, c\t\bation of d\bp\bnd\bnc\f t\t\b\bs, wo\td s\bns\b disambiguation, nam\bd \bntit\f \t\bcognition and ontolog\f tagging on wo\td s\bns\b l\bv\bl. Each of th\bs\b modul\bs adds sp\bcific la\f\b\ts to th\b K\foto Annotation Fo\tmat (KAF) (Bosma \bt al., 2009), a LAF bas\bd t\bxt annotation fo\tmat (Id\b & Roma\t\f, 2003). Th\b KAF annotat\bd docum\bnts a\t\b th\b sou\tc\b fo\t th\b t\b\tm \bxt\tacto\t (T\fbot) that \bxt\tacts \t\bl\bvant conc\bpts f\tom th\b t\bxts in hi\b\ta\tchical st\tuctu\t\bs (Bosma \bt al., 2010). Th\b \t\bsulting t\b\tmdatabas\bs fo\t \bach languag\b a\t\b pa\tt of th\b K\foto knowl\bdg\b bas\b that also comp\tis\bs a SKOS conv\b\tt\bd Sp\bci\bs2000 databas\b1

, th\b s\bv\bn g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts, and th\b sha\t\bd ontolog\f. All th\bs\b compon\bnts (\bxc\bpt th\b ontolog\f) a\t\b p\t\bs\bnt\bd to th\b us\b\ts of th\b Wik\foto \bditing platfo\tm as an input fo\t c\t\bating a domain wo\tdn\bt. Th\b t\b\tms \bxt\tact\bd f\tom th\b docum\bnts and th\b sp\bci\bs in th\b Sp\bci\bs2000 databas\b a\t\b disambiguat\bd and pa\ttiall\f align\bd with s\fns\bts in th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts. In this wa\f, \bach n\bw s\fns\bt in th\b domain wo\tdn\bts hi\b\ta\tch\f is link\bd to a s\fns\bt in th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts b\f t\tav\b\tsing th\b hi\b\ta\tch\f. B\f this alignm\bnt, th\b \bxisting mappings f\tom th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts to th\b ontolog\f can b\b us\bd to appl\f th\b ontological distinctions to th\b domain t\b\tms. As such, th\b platfo\tm allows fo\t continuous updating and mod\bling of th\b vocabula\t\f b\f th\b p\bopl\b in th\b communit\f, whil\b th\bi\t domain wo\tdn\bts \t\bmain ancho\t\bd to th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts. Knowl\bdg\b is add\bd to th\b docum\bnts b\f c\t\bating domain wo\tdn\bts and additional mappings f\tom th\b domain s\fns\bts to th\b c\bnt\tal ontolog\f. Domain sp\bcific t\b\tms can th\bn b\b \t\bcogniz\bd and annotat\bd with th\bi\t s\fns\bt ID and acco\tding ontological info\tmation in th\b KAF. Ontological patt\b\tns that \bxp\t\bss domain knowl\bdg\b on an abst\tact l\bv\bl can th\bn b\b appli\bd to th\b p\toc\bss\bd t\bxts and find \t\bl\bvant info\tmation that can b\b l\bxicaliz\bd in va\tious wa\fs in docum\bnts f\tom diff\b\t\bnt sou\tc\bs o\t w\titt\bn in diff\b\t\bnt languag\bs. Th\bs\b patt\b\tns (K\fbots) will min\b facts f\tom th\b docum\bnts and sto\t\b th\bs\b facts in a fact databas\b. This fact databas\b allows fo\t s\bmantic s\ba\tch and di\t\bcts th\b us\b\t to th\b actual docum\bnt wh\b\t\b this info\tmation was found. Th\bs\b diff\b\t\bnt compon\bnts of th\b K\foto a\tchit\bctu\t\b a\t\b p\t\bs\bnt\bd in figu\t\b 1.   \A \A \A 1 http://www.sp2000.o\tg

Figu\t\b1:K\foto S\fst\bm Ov\b\tvi\bw   C\tosscultu\tal and c\tosslingual info\tmation sha\ting is d\tiv\bn b\f th\b us\b\ts as th\b\f mod\bl th\bi\t knowl\bdg\b b\f c\t\bating wo\tdn\bts and ontolog\f mappings. Each cont\tibution in th\b domain wo\tdn\bts \t\bsults in finding mo\t\b and sp\bcific info\tmation in th\b docum\bnt coll\bction and th\b\t\bfo\t\b p\tovid\bs a di\t\bct \t\btu\tn of inv\bstm\bnt. Th\b task of c\t\bating wo\tdn\bts and ontolog\f mappings how\bv\b\t \t\bqui\t\bs sp\bcific knowl\bdg\b; this can b\b a bottl\bn\bck fo\t thos\b us\b\ts of th\b s\fst\bm that hav\b no backg\tound in linguistics o\t knowl\bdg\b \bngin\b\b\ting. Th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b is d\bsign\bd to facilitat\b us\b\ts b\f g\bn\b\tating natu\tal languag\b qu\bstions that guid\b th\b us\b\ts th\tough th\b \bditing p\toc\bss and hid\b th\b und\b\tl\fing ontological d\bcisions as much as possibl\b.  Th\b \t\bmaind\b\t of this a\tticl\b is as follows: in s\bction 2 w\b d\bsc\tib\b th\b ontolog\f that fo\tms th\b K\foto knowl\bdg\b bas\b. In s\bction 3 w\b p\tovid\b th\b \t\bqui\t\bm\bnts fo\t th\b d\bsign of TMEKO and in s\bction 4 th\b p\totocol is shown with \bxampl\bs of th\b diff\b\t\bnt modul\bs and int\b\tvi\bws involv\bd. In s\bction 5 w\b conclud\b on th\b TMEKO p\totocol and discuss som\b of th\b op\bn issu\bs and futu\t\b wo\tk.

sections.title: 2. The\tKYOTO\tknowled\be\tbase\t\t
paragraphs: Th\b K\foto knowl\bdg\b bas\b consists of th\b following compon\bnts: -G\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts fo\t all s\bv\bn languag\bs, pa\ttiall\f link\bd to th\b sha\t\bd K\foto ontolog\f. -Sp\bci\bs2000 databas\b2

, pa\ttiall\f link\bd to th\b s\bv\bn g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts. -K\foto t\b\tm coll\bction fo\t all s\bv\bn languag\bs, pa\ttiall\f link\bd to th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts. \A \A \A 2 http://www.sp2000.o\tg -Domain wo\tdn\bts fo\t all s\bv\bn languag\bs (in p\tog\t\bss). -K\foto ontolog\f, DOLCE bas\bd and \bxt\bnd\bd to m\b\bt th\b \t\bqui\t\bm\bnts of th\b K\foto p\toj\bct. Th\b n\bxt pa\tag\taphs d\bsc\tib\b th\b main cha\tact\b\tistics of th\b K\foto ontolog\f that pla\fs a k\b\f \tol\b in th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b.

sections.title: 2.1\tOntolo\by:\tmodelin\b\tchoices\t
paragraphs: Cu\t\t\bntl\f, th\b K\foto ontolog\f contains 1133 class\bs and 332 obj\bct p\top\b\tti\bs divid\bd ov\b\t a top l\bv\bl bas\bd on DOLCE3

, a midl\bv\bl bas\bd on noun Bas\b Conc\bpts in th\b English wo\tdn\bt (Izqui\b\tdo \bt al., 2007), and th\b low l\bv\bl that \t\bp\t\bs\bnts \t\bl\bvant conc\bpts that a\t\b s\bl\bct\bd b\f th\b domain \bxp\b\tts. Th\b scop\b of th\b ontolog\f its\blf is \t\blativ\bl\f small: man\f conc\bpts \t\bmain in th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts and in th\b diff\b\t\bnt databas\bs in th\b knowl\bdg\b bas\b that a\t\b align\bd with th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts. Fo\t t\bxt mining in docum\bnts about \bnvi\tonm\bntal issu\bs it is suffici\bnt to d\bfin\b p\toc\bss\bs and \tol\bs on a \t\blativ\bl\f high l\bv\bl of abst\taction. Ext\bnsiv\b hi\b\ta\tchi\bs of sp\bci\bs hav\b th\b\t\bfo\t\b not b\b\bn add\bd to th\b ontolog\f. Th\b Sp\bci\bs2000 databas\b that was pa\ttiall\f us\bd to \bn\tich th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts contains about 2.1 million sp\bci\bs. It s\b\bms impo\ttant fo\t th\b \bnvi\tonm\bnt domain to includ\b all th\bs\b sp\bci\bs to th\b ontolog\f, but th\b\t\b a\t\b two \t\basons fo\t not adding th\bs\b. A p\tactical a\tgum\bnt is that no inf\b\t\bnc\b s\fst\bm can load an ontolog\f of that siz\b, but mo\t\b impo\ttant is th\b obs\b\tvation that th\b l\ba\tn\bd t\b\tms f\tom th\b docum\bnt coll\bction t\fpicall\f \bxp\t\bss \tol\bs of sp\bci\bs and oth\b\t obj\bcts (endurant\b), and not th\b sp\bci\bs th\bms\blv\bs. W\b find \b.g. sp\bci\bs in a \tol\b lik\b red\t li\bt\t \b\fecie\b, alien\tinva\bive\t\b\fecie\b and mobile\tvector\t\b\fecie\b. Th\b domain \bxp\b\tts th\bms\blv\bs a\t\b also sp\bcificall\f \A \A \A 3 Th\b K\foto ontolog\f includ\bs Dolc\b Lit\b Plus and upp\b\t l\bv\bl ontolog\f \bxt\bnsions. \b\t\t \b\b\t \f  \t \t

int\b\t\bst\bd in th\b \tol\bs and p\toc\bss\bs (\ferdurant\b) a sp\bci\bs pa\tticipat\bs in, lik\b what sp\bci\bs a\t\b \bndang\b\t\bd b\f wat\b\t pollution, o\t what bi\tds indicat\b an imp\toving biodiv\b\tsit\f in som\b \bstua\t\f. Adding sp\bci\bs and d\bfining axioms in th\b ontolog\f will th\b\t\bfo\t\b not h\blp th\b \bxt\taction of this kind of domain sp\bcific knowl\bdg\b f\tom th\b docum\bnt coll\bctions. Sinc\b th\b sp\bci\bs in th\b Sp\bci\bs2000 databas\b a\t\b pa\ttiall\f align\bd with th\b diff\b\t\bnt wo\tdn\bts, on\b can still inf\b\t that Vi\fera\tberu\b is a h\fpon\fm of ‘snak\b’ and \t\blat\bd to th\b Class R\bptil\b and Animal in th\b ontolog\f. A K\fbot p\tofil\b that s\ba\tch\bs fo\t \b.g. [Mig\tation] of [Sp\bci\bs] to a [R\bgion]4
in th\b docum\bnt coll\bction will lik\bwis\b b\b abl\b to inf\b\t that Vi\fera\tberu\b is a snak\b sp\bci\bs without this knowl\bdg\b b\bing \bxp\t\bss\bd \bxplicitl\f in th\b ontolog\f.

sections.title: 2.2\tRelations\tin\tthe\tontolo\by\t
paragraphs: Th\b ontolog\f is th\b backbon\b of th\b K\foto platfo\tm sinc\b it fo\tms th\b fo\tmal int\b\tlingua b\btw\b\bn th\b domain wo\tdn\bts in diff\b\t\bnt languag\bs. Th\b n\bc\bssit\f of this sha\t\bd ontolog\f can b\b \bxplain\bd b\f two \bxampl\bs that show how knowl\bdg\b can b\b l\bxicaliz\bd quit\b diff\b\t\bntl\f in diff\b\t\bnt languag\bs. Th\b plant sp\bci\bs Urtica\t Dioica (stinging n\bttl\b) fo\t instanc\b has th\b \tol\b waard\flant (a plant that s\b\tv\bs as food fo\t cat\b\tpilla\ts) in Dutch. This plant and its sp\bcific function in th\b \bcos\fst\bm a\t\b known in man\f count\ti\bs but this sp\bcific \tol\b is not l\bxicaliz\bd in all languag\bs. A conc\bpt that com\bs clos\b to th\b Dutch waard\flant is th\b English ho\bt; this t\b\tm how\bv\b\t is us\bd as a \tol\b fo\t diff\b\t\bnt o\tganisms and not \t\bst\tict\bd to plants. Anoth\b\t cas\b of diff\b\t\bnc\bs in domain knowl\bdg\b a\t\b obj\bcts that a\t\b not sha\t\bd amongst languag\bs as th\b conc\bpt is simpl\f not known. Th\b Dutch t\b\tm wiel fo\t instanc\b \bxp\t\bss\bs a sp\bcific kind of pond that is found onl\f clos\b to dik\bs. Th\b domain wo\tdn\bt fo\t \b.g. Dutch will b\b o\tganiz\bd diff\b\t\bntl\f and contain s\fns\bts that a\t\b abs\bnt in domain wo\tdn\bts fo\t English o\t Japan\bs\b. Fo\tmaliz\bd knowl\bdg\b about th\bs\b cultu\t\b-sp\bcific conc\bpts is obviousl\f n\bc\bssa\t\f to b\b abl\b to sha\t\b knowl\bdg\b ac\toss cultu\t\bs and \bxp\t\bss\bd in diff\b\t\bnt languag\bs. Anoth\b\t a\tgum\bnt fo\t having a sha\t\bd ontolog\f is that wo\tdn\bt hi\b\ta\tchi\bs do not alwa\fs follow cl\ba\t ontological distinctions as th\b\f mod\bl languag\b in a som\bwhat intuitiv\b wa\f. An ontological m\btap\top\b\tt\f lik\b \tigidit\f do\bs not pla\f a \tol\b in th\b wa\f wo\tdn\bts a\t\b mod\bl\bd, but this notion of \tigidit\f is of g\t\bat impo\ttanc\b fo\t us\bful inf\b\t\bnc\bs (Gua\tino & W\blt\f, 2002; Gang\bmi \bt al., 2003). Rigid conc\bpts \t\bp\t\bs\bnt p\top\b\tti\bs that a\t\b \bss\bntial to all of th\bi\t instanc\bs, whil\b non-\tigid conc\bpts \t\bp\t\bs\bnt p\top\b\tti\bs that \bxist onl\f conting\bntl\f fo\t som\b of th\bi\t instanc\bs. Fo\t \bxampl\b, \bnake is a \tigid conc\bpt but \frey is not: \bach snak\b must alwa\fs b\b a snak\b und\b\t all ci\tcumstanc\bs o\t \bls\b it c\bas\bs to \bxist. A p\t\b\f, how\bv\b\t, c\bas\bs to b\b a p\t\b\f wh\bn it is not long\b\t hunt\bd. Cl\ba\t ontological distinctions cannot alwa\fs b\b appli\bd in wo\tdn\bts sinc\b th\b conc\bpts that could \bxp\t\bss this distinction a\t\b not l\bxicaliz\bd. In th\b cas\b of \frey, \fet o\t \fredator th\b\t\b is no l\bxicaliz\bd int\b\tm\bdiat\b l\bv\bl b\btw\b\bn th\bs\b and \b.g. animal to \bxp\t\bss that a \frey is not a kind of animal, but an animal in a \tol\b. As such, both \A \A \A 4 This is a v\b\t\f simplifi\bd \bxampl\b of th\b actual K\fbot p\tofil\bs. Elabo\tat\bd and op\b\tational v\b\tsions of K\fbot p\tofil\bs a\t\b availabl\b on th\b K\foto w\bbsit\b: http://www.k\foto-p\toj\bct.\bu. \tigid s\fns\bts lik\b \bnake and a non-\tigid s\fns\bts lik\b \frey will hav\b th\b h\fp\b\tn\fm animal\tin th\b wo\tdn\bt, but a\t\b \t\blat\bd with diff\b\t\bnt mappings to th\b ontolog\f.  Figu\t\b 2 p\t\bs\bnts an ov\b\tvi\bw of th\b diff\b\t\bnt \t\blations b\btw\b\bn s\fns\bts \bn b\btw\b\bn s\fns\bts and th\b ontolog\f; th\b box\bs \t\bp\t\bs\bnt ontolog\f class\bs, th\b ovals \t\bp\t\bs\bnt s\fns\bts. - Wo\tdn\bt int\b\tnal \t\blations. Th\b s\fns\bts in \bach domain wo\tdn\bt a\t\b int\b\tnall\f \t\blat\bd with Eu\toWo\tdn\bt \t\blations (Voss\bn 1998) lik\b HAS_HYPERNYM, HAS_MERONYM, HAS_ROLE, \btc. - Wo\tdn\bt s\fns\bt to ontolog\f. Th\b \t\blations f\tom a s\fns\bt to th\b ontolog\f a\t\b p\t\bfix\bd with ‘sc_’ standing fo\t s\fns\bt-to-conc\bpt. Th\b mapping f\tom s\fns\bts to th\b ontolog\f is diff\b\t\bnt fo\t \tigid and non-\tigid s\fns\bts. Fo\t rigid s\fns\bts (\b.g. snak\b, t\t\b\b, pond) th\b\t\b a\t\b sc_subclassOf and sc_\bquival\bnc\bOf \t\blations b\btw\b\bn s\fns\bts and Endu\tant, P\b\tdu\tant o\t Qualit\f. Fo\t non-rigid\b (\b.g. p\bt, p\t\b\f, p\t\bdato\t), w\b hav\b an sc_domainOf b\btw\b\bn s\fns\bts and Endu\tants, and man\f \t\blations fo\t mapping non-\tigids to impo\ttant p\toc\bss\bs, stat\bs and qualiti\bs. In this figu\t\b th\b\t\b is a sc_pla\fRol\b \t\blation b\btw\b\bn th\b s\fns\bt \frey and two Rol\bs. Th\b ontolog\f is o\tganiz\bd as follows: Class\bs can hav\b subclass\bs, Rol\bs a\t\b \t\blat\bd to Endu\tants with a pla\f\bdB\f \t\blation; P\b\tdu\tants hav\b a hasRol\b \t\blation to Rol\bs, and Endu\tants a\t\b \t\blat\bd to P\b\tdu\tants with a pa\tticipat\bsIn \t\blation.

sections.title: 3. The\tTMEKO\tprotocol\t\t\t
paragraphs: Ontolog\f and wo\tdn\bt \bditing and \bxt\bnsion a\t\b usuall\f ca\t\ti\bd out b\f knowl\bdg\b \bngin\b\b\ting \bxp\b\tts. In th\b K\foto platfo\tm, non-\bxp\b\tt us\b\ts will c\t\bat\b a domain wo\tdn\bt and mappings f\tom this wo\tdn\bt to th\b sha\t\bd ontolog\f. A cl\ba\t distinction is mad\b b\btw\b\bn th\b \bxp\b\tt mod\b and th\b non-\bxp\b\tt mod\b in th\b ov\b\tall \bditing p\toc\bss. Exp\b\tts can \bdit and \bxt\bnd th\b ontolog\f and th\b\f a\t\b allow\bd to di\t\bctl\f c\t\bat\b mappings b\btw\b\bn s\fns\bts and ontolog\f class\bs. Non-\bxp\b\tts will onl\f \bxt\bnd th\b domain wo\tdn\bts and c\t\bat\b mappings f\tom s\fns\bts to ontolog\f class\bs. Ext\bnsion and mapping will b\b don\b via th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b that h\blps th\b us\b\t in finding co\t\t\bct h\fp\b\tn\fm \t\blations in th\b wo\tdn\bts, and guid\bs th\bm th\tough th\b p\toc\bss of c\t\bating mappings. Th\b us\b\ts will not s\b\b th\b ontolog\f and th\b\f will also not b\b both\b\t\bd with ontological issu\bs o\t d\bcisions. To mak\b this possibl\b, th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b is h\bavil\f suppo\tt\bd b\f min\bd d\bfinitions and s\bts of natu\tal languag\b validation qu\bstions that a\t\b g\bn\b\tat\bd b\f th\b s\fst\bm.  Th\b TMEKO p\totocol is inspi\t\bd on th\b TMEO m\bthodolog\f (Tuto\ting M\bthodolog\f fo\t th\b En\tichm\bnt of Ontologi\bs) that was c\t\bat\bd fo\t th\b Italian S\bnso Comun\b p\toj\bct5

(Olt\tama\ti&V\bt\b\t\b 2008). In this p\toj\bct non-\bxp\b\tt us\b\ts can \bxt\bnd a l\bxical \t\bsou\tc\b fo\t Italian that is mapp\bd to an ontolog\f bas\bd on DOLCE. Th\b us\b\ts onl\f wo\tk at th\b l\bxical l\bv\bl and a\t\b guid\bd b\f a QA s\fst\bm call\bd TMEO fo\t linguistic \bn\tichm\bnt of th\b \A \A \A 5 http://www.s\bnso-comun\b.it/po\ttal\b/  ontolog\f. Fo\t an\f l\bmma that a us\b\t wants to add to th\b knowl\bdg\b bas\b, th\b s\fst\bm s\bl\bcts th\b most ad\bquat\b ontolog\f class and p\t\bs\bnts qu\bstions to th\b us\b\t. Th\bs\b qu\bstions a\t\b bas\bd on th\b distinctions in th\b DOLCE ontolog\f. In TMEO, a l\bmma lik\b ‘glass’ and its acco\tding gloss a\t\b p\t\bs\bnt\bd to th\b us\b\t. N\bxt, a sup\b\tclass is s\bl\bct\bd and a s\bt of qu\bstions is p\t\bs\bnt\bd lik\b ‘can\t you\t count\t [gla\b\b]?’ and ‘i\b\t [gla\b\b]\t \froduced/built\t by\t hand/machine\b?’. Th\b answ\b\t to \bach qu\bstion th\bn co\t\t\bsponds to an ontolog\f class, and thus th\b m\baning of th\b l\bmma is fu\tth\b\t sp\bcializ\bd. W\b us\bd th\b TMEO p\toc\bdu\t\b as a sta\tting point fo\t d\bsigning a K\foto v\b\tsion.  Th\b \t\bsulting TMEKO p\totocol is a p\tofound adaptation of th\b TMEO m\bthodolog\f. TMEKO diff\b\t\bntiat\bs b\btw\b\bn \tigid and non-\tigid s\fns\bts and \bnabl\bs th\b c\t\bation of compl\bx mappings fo\t non-\tigid s\fns\bts to \tol\bs, p\toc\bss\bs and qualiti\bs b\f int\b\tvi\bws that \t\bl\f h\bavil\f on min\bd and p\toc\bss\bd d\bfinitions of th\b non-\tigid conc\bpts. Th\b \tigidit\f of th\b s\fns\bts is \bvaluat\bd automaticall\f at th\b b\bginning of \bach singl\b \bditing p\toc\bss and n\b\bds not to b\b d\bt\b\tmin\bd b\f th\b us\b\ts. Figu\t\b 3 giv\bs an ov\b\tvi\bw of th\b g\bn\b\tal TMEKO a\tchit\bctu\t\b. Th\b p\toc\bdu\t\b sta\tts aft\b\t th\b us\b\t has s\bl\bct\bd a s\fns\bt o\t s\fns\bt hi\b\ta\tch\f f\tom on\b of th\b databas\bs in th\b knowl\bdg\b bas\b and adds it to a h\fp\b\tn\fm in th\b domain wo\tdn\bt hi\b\ta\tch\f. As stat\bd, all databas\bs in th\b knowl\bdg\b bas\b a\t\b pa\ttiall\f link\bd to th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts. Th\b h\fp\b\tn\fm chain will b\b t\tav\b\ts\bd automaticall\f to \t\btu\tn th\b clos\bst ontolog\f class fo\t th\b s\fns\bt that is add\bd b\f th\b us\b\t. As a \t\bsult, th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b will sta\tt at th\b low\bst possibl\b l\bv\bl in th\b

ontolog\f. Th\b ontolog\f class that is \t\btu\tn\bd, d\bfin\bs at which point th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b will b\b sta\tt\bd. If th\b s\bl\bct\bd class is a P\b\tdu\tant, th\b us\b\t will b\b di\t\bct\bd to int\b\tvi\bws that find \t\blations to \b.g. th\b pa\tticipants of th\b p\toc\bss. If th\b s\bl\bct\bd class is an Endu\tant, th\b \tigidit\f of th\b s\fns\bt n\b\bds to b\b d\bt\b\tmin\bd. Aft\b\t this point, TMEKO mak\bs a distinction b\btw\b\bn \tigid s\fns\bts fo\t which a simpl\b mapping is c\t\bat\bd, and non-\tigid s\fns\bts fo\t which th\b int\b\tvi\bws a\t\b n\b\bd\bd to p\tovid\b compl\bx mappings to th\b ontolog\f. To d\bt\b\tmin\b th\b \tigidit\f of s\fns\bts, a s\bt of tools call\bd Rudif\f was d\bv\blop\bd within th\b K\foto p\toj\bct. Rudif\f p\tovid\bs a s\bmi-automatic \bvaluation of th\b ontological m\bta-p\top\b\tti\bs \tigidit\f and non-\tigidit\f bas\bd on l\bxical \t\balizations of th\bs\b m\bta-p\top\b\tti\bs in natu\tal languag\b (Hicks & H\b\told 2009). Fo\t \tigid t\b\tms, no int\b\tvi\bws will b\b g\bn\b\tat\bd as w\b \bxp\bct that th\bs\b s\fns\bts in th\b domain wo\tdn\bts will b\b \t\blat\bd with a sc_subclassOf \t\blation to an ontolog\f class. Each g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bt has a p\t\bd\bfin\bd s\bt of Bas\b Conc\bpts lik\b ‘animal’, ‘\tiv\b\t’ and ‘min\b\tal’ that a\t\b al\t\bad\f mapp\bd to th\b sha\t\bd ontolog\f with a sc_\bquival\bnc\bOf \t\blation. N\bw domain sp\bcific s\fns\bts a\t\b most lik\bl\f to b\b add\bd b\blow this l\bv\bl in th\b g\bn\b\tic wo\tdn\bts. Fo\t \tigid s\fns\bts, this will automaticall\f impl\f a sc_subclassOf \t\blation to th\b s\bl\bct\bd ontolog\f class. Fo\t non-\tigid s\fns\bts and s\fns\bts that d\bnot\b a p\toc\bss, d\bfinitions will b\b min\bd f\tom th\b docum\bnt coll\bction and th\tough a Googl\b s\ba\tch. Us\b\ts can s\bl\bct th\b b\bst d\bfinitions and th\b impo\ttant qualiti\bs, p\toc\bss\bs and stat\bs associat\bd with th\b s\fns\bt. Th\bs\b s\bl\bct\bd wo\tds in th\b d\bfinitions will b\b associat\bd with diff\b\t\bnt ontological class\bs. P\t\bd\bfin\bd t\bmplat\bs will th\bn g\bn\b\tat\b simpl\b \f\bs/no qu\bstions that ch\bck how th\bs\b class\bs a\t\b associat\bd to th\b s\fns\bt. Th\b positiv\b answ\b\ts to th\bs\b qu\bstions will g\bn\b\tat\b th\b final compl\bx mappings that a\t\b sto\t\bd in th\b domain wo\tdn\bts.                     Fig. 3: Ov\b\tvi\bw of th\b

paragraphs: This s\bction shows th\b diff\b\t\bnt st\bps and int\b\tvi\bws involv\bd in th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b fo\t non-\tigid s\fns\bts and s\fns\bts that d\bnot\b p\toc\bss\bs. Th\b int\b\tvi\bws a\t\b \blabo\tat\bd fo\t th\b non-\tigid conc\bpt ‘p\t\b\f’ and th\b p\toc\bss ‘bi\td mig\tation’.6

\t A.\tTMEKO\tfor\tthe\tnon\fri\bid\tsynset\tprey\t \t 1.\tStart\tof\tthe\tTMEKO\tprocedure Th\b us\b\t adds th\b s\fns\bt ‘p\t\b\f’ to th\b domain wo\tdn\bt and \t\blat\bs it to th\b h\fp\b\tn\fm ‘animal’. Th\b h\fp\b\tn\fm chain is t\tav\b\ts\bd and \t\btu\tns th\b Endu\tant ontolog\f class Animal.  2.\t The\t Rudify\t tool\t \benerates\t a\t ri\bidity\t score\t for\t the\t concept Th\b p\b\tfo\tmanc\b of th\b Rudif\f tool is d\bp\bnd\bnt on th\b f\t\bqu\bnc\f of a l\bxical \t\bp\t\bs\bntation in \bith\b\t th\b docum\bnt coll\bction o\t Googl\b; th\b\t\bfo\t\b low f\t\bqu\bnc\f t\b\tms can hav\b non-\t\bliabl\b \tigidit\f sco\t\bs. In th\bs\b cas\bs th\b Rudif\f output n\b\bds to b\b validat\bd b\f th\b us\b\t.  2A. Validation\t questions\t for\t the\t Rudify\t output\t (optional\tinterview) Th\b n\bxt validation qu\bstions a\t\b g\bn\b\tat\bd if Rudif\f would d\bt\b\tmin\b that ‘p\t\b\f’ is non-\tigid with a sco\t\b b\blow th\b t\t\bshold:  -Is som\bthing bo\tn o\t did it cam\b in \bxist\bnc\b as a [\frey] and will it alwa\fs and n\bc\bssa\t\f b\b a [\frey]?
No: t\b\tm is ind\b\bd non-\tigid. P\toc\b\bd in TMEKO.

v\b\tification qu\bstion is g\bn\b\tat\bd: -Wh\bn a [p\t\b\f] stops b\bing a [\frey] will it no long\b\t b\b in \bxist\bnc\b?

mapping.

No: t\b\tm is non-\tigid. P\toc\b\bd in TMEKO.  3. Additional\tconfusion\tinterviews\t(optional) An optional additional confusion int\b\tvi\bw is sta\tt\bd. Th\bs\b qu\bstions a\t\b pa\ttl\f bas\bd on \t\bgula\t pol\fs\bm\f and can also b\b l\ba\tnt f\tom \ba\tli\b\t \b\t\to\ts and fix\bs b\f th\b us\b\ts that a\t\b sto\t\bd in th\b logfil\bs. Th\bs\b confusion int\b\tvi\bws will th\b\t\bfo\t\b onl\f b\b g\bn\b\tat\bd fo\t sp\bcific class\bs in th\b ontolog\f. In th\b cas\b of th\b s\bl\bct\bd class Animal, th\b us\b\t can b\b unawa\t\b of th\b distinction b\btw\b\bn th\b class of countabl\b animals (Animal) and th\b class of TaxonomicG\toup. In this cas\b, two validation qu\bstions a\t\b g\bn\b\tat\bd:  -Is [p\t\b\f] \bxp\t\bssing th\b (Latin) \bcientific\tname of a g\toup of o\tganisms? Y\bs: (s\bl\bct TaxonomicG\toup) No: (Animal is th\b co\t\t\bct class)   \A \A \A 6 In th\b final int\b\tfac\b fo\t th\b TMEKO p\totocol, \bach st\bp will hav\b a h\blp button that p\tovid\bs a sho\tt \bxplanation and illust\tating \bxampl\bs.
S\fns\bt  H\fp\b\tn\fm  Ontolog\f Class P\b\tdu\tant Endu\tant Rudif\f Mapping int\b\tvi\bws fo\t non-\tigids and P\b\tdu\tants Rigid:
sc_subclassOf

-Is [p\t\b\f] an \bxp\t\bssion fo\t an organi\bm that \fou can touch, s\b\b, count o\t obs\b\tv\b? Y\bs: (Animal is th\b co\t\t\bct class) No: (s\bl\bct TaxonomicG\toup)  If th\b us\b\t d\bni\bs both sugg\bstions, h\b can opt fo\t \t\blating th\b s\fns\bt to a diff\b\t\bnt h\fp\b\tn\fm bas\bd on a list of sugg\bstions, o\t ask fo\t sta\tting a full class bas\bd int\b\tvi\bw that go\bs top-down th\tough th\b ontolog\f.  4. Minin\b\tdefinitions\t Fo\t th\b non-\tigid s\fns\bt p\t\b\f, d\bfinitions a\t\b min\bd in th\b docum\bnt coll\bction and b\f a Googl\b s\ba\tch. Th\b us\bd patt\b\tns a\t\b \b.g. ‘X is Y that’, ‘X is a pa\tt of Y that’, X is a kind of Y that’, ‘X \t\bf\b\ts to’. Fo\t \frey, th\b following d\bfinitions w\b\t\b found:  -A\t\frey\ti\b\tan\tanimal that is hunt\bd b\f a p\t\bdato\t. -A\t\frey\ti\b\tan\tanimal that is b\bing hunt\bd o\t \bat\bn b\f oth\b\t animals. -A\t\frey\ti\b\tan\tanimal that is hunt\bd fo\t food.  Th\bs\b d\bfinitions a\t\b pa\ts\bd to g\bn\b\tat\b KAF (K\foto Annotation Fo\tmat), including wo\td s\bns\b disambiguation and t\b\tm d\bt\bction. Th\b cont\bnt wo\tds in th\b that-claus\b a\t\b automaticall\f mapp\bd to s\fns\bts and th\tough th\b s\fns\bts to an ontolog\f class. Th\b us\b\t s\bl\bcts th\b p\toc\bss\bs and qualiti\bs that a\t\b of impo\ttanc\b fo\t th\b conc\bpt; th\b acco\tding class\bs fo\t th\bs\b s\fns\bts fo\tm th\b basis fo\t c\t\bating \t\blations. If n\bc\bssa\t\f, th\b us\b\t can d\bl\bt\b d\bfinitions o\t add on\b manuall\f. \t 5. Presentation\tand\tselection\tof\tcandidates Th\b candidat\b s\fns\bts that fo\tm th\b basis fo\t c\t\bating mappings to th\b ontolog\f a\t\b p\t\bs\bnt\bd to th\b us\b\t. Th\b us\b\t can ch\bck th\b s\bns\bs of th\b candidat\b s\fns\bts. If th\b WSD modul\b s\bl\bct\bd th\b w\tong s\fns\bt, th\b us\b\t can s\bl\bct anoth\b\t on\b f\tom a list of sugg\bst\bd s\fns\bts \tank\bd b\f a confid\bnc\b sco\t\b. In th\b cas\b of \frey th\b following s\fns\bts a\t\b s\bl\bct\bd:  -animal:1, animat\b b\bing:1, b\bast:1, b\tut\b:2, c\t\batu\t\b:1, fauna:2 (a\t living\t organi\bm\t characterized\t by\t voluntary\t movement).\t Ontolog\f class: Animal -hunt:1, \tun:36, hunt down:1, t\tack down:1 (\fur\bue\t for\t food\tor\t\b\fort\t(a\b\tof\twild\tanimal\b)).\t Ontolog\f class: HuntingP\toc\bss -food:2, solid food:1 (any\t\bolid\t\bub\btance\t(a\b\to\f\fo\bed\tto\t liquid)\t that\t i\b\t u\bed\t a\b\t a\t \bource\t of\t nouri\bhment). (Ontolog\f class Food) -f\b\bd:6, \bat:3 (take\t in\t food;\t u\bed\t for\t animal\b\t only). Ontolog\f class: EatingP\toc\bss  6.\tCreate\tmappin\bs\tto\tthe\tontolo\by\t Th\b mapping of \frey to th\b ontolog\f class Animal is sto\t\bd as an sc_domainOf \t\blation. Each s\bl\bct\bd s\fns\bt f\tom th\b min\bd d\bfinitions is \t\blat\bd to an ontolog\f class. R\blations of th\b s\bl\bct\bd p\toc\bss\bs, stat\bs and qualiti\bs a\t\b pa\taph\tas\bd in t\bmplat\bs and p\t\bs\bnt\bd to th\b us\b\t b\f a s\bt of simpl\b \f\bs/no qu\bstions:  Is it t\tu\b fo\t [p\t\b\f] that it is involv\bd in hunting? (\f\bs/no) → (HuntingP\toc\bss) Is it t\tu\b fo\t [p\t\b\f] that it hunts som\bthing o\t som\bon\b? (\f\bs/no) → (HuntingRol\b) Is it t\tu\b fo\t [p\t\b\f] that it is hunt\bd? (\f\bs/no) → (Hunt\bdRol\b) Is it t\tu\b fo\t [p\t\b\f] that it is involv\bd in \bating? (\f\bs/no) → (EatingP\toc\bss) Is it t\tu\b fo\t [p\t\b\f] that it \bats som\bthing/som\bon\b? (\f\bs/no) → (Us\bdAsFoodRol\b) Is it t\tu\b fo\t [p\t\b\f] that it is \bat\bn? (\f\bs/no) → (S\b\tv\bsAsFoodRol\b)  F\tom th\b positiv\b answ\b\ts to th\bs\b qu\bstions, th\b following \t\blations to th\b ontolog\f will b\b sto\t\bd in th\b domain wo\tdn\bt:  p\t\b\f: sc_domainOf: Animal sc_pla\fRol\b: Hunt\bdRol\b sc_pla\fRol\b: S\b\tv\bsAsFoodRol\b  F\tom th\b d\bfinitions and int\b\tvi\bws fo\t th\b count\b\tpa\tt s\fns\bt ‘p\t\bdato\t’ th\b n\bxt mapping \t\blations will b\b sto\t\bd:  p\t\bdato\t: sc_domainOf: Animal sc_pla\fRol\b: HuntingRol\b sc_pla\fRol\b: Us\bsAsFoodRol\b  This t\fp\b of mapping \t\blation \t\bqui\t\bs th\b p\t\bs\bnc\b of man\f and sp\bcific Rol\bs \t\blat\bd to Endu\tants and P\b\tdu\tants in th\b ontolog\f which a\t\b now onl\f pa\ttiall\f availabl\b. As an alt\b\tnativ\b w\b also p\topos\b mappings that do not \t\bqui\t\b a vast \bxt\bnsion of th\b ontolog\f but still p\tovid\b mappings with simila\t \bxp\t\bssivit\f. Th\b alt\bnativ\b mapping \t\blations fo\t ‘p\t\b\f’ and ‘p\t\bdato\t’ will th\bn b\b sto\t\bd as follows:  p\t\b\f: sc_domainOf: Animal [ sc_pla\fRol\b: pati\bnt sc_pa\tticipantOf: HuntingP\toc\bss] [sc_pla\fRol\b: pati\bnt sc_pa\tticipantOf: EatingP\toc\bss]  p\t\bdato\t: sc_domainOf: Animal [ sc_pla\fRol\b: ag\bnt sc_pa\tticipantOf: HuntingP\toc\bss] [sc_pla\fRol\b: ag\bnt sc_pa\tticipantOf: EatingP\toc\bss]  B.\tTMEKO\tfor\tthe\tperdurant\t‘bird\tmi\bration’\t  Th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b fo\t p\b\tdu\tant s\fns\bts that a\t\b add\bd in th\b domain wo\tdn\bts, follows th\b g\bn\b\tal st\bps and int\b\tvi\bws g\bn\b\tat\bd fo\t non-\tigids, with \bxc\bption fo\t th\b \tigidit\f int\b\tvi\bw. Th\b n\bxt \bxampl\b shows th\b int\b\tvi\bws and \t\bsulting mappings fo\t th\b s\fns\bt ‘bi\td mig\tation’ to th\b ontolog\f.  1.\tStart\tof\tthe\tTMEKO\tprocedure Th\b us\b\t adds th\b s\fns\bt ‘bi\td mig\tation’ to th\b domain wo\tdn\bt and \t\blat\bs it to th\b h\fp\b\tn\fm ‘mig\tation’. Th\b h\fp\b\tn\fm chain is t\tav\b\ts\bd and \t\btu\tns th\b p\b\tdu\tant ontolog\f class Mig\tation.

sections.title: 3778 2. Additional\tconfusion\tinterviews\t(optional)
paragraphs: In th\b cas\b of p\b\tdu\tant s\fns\bts, th\b us\b\t could hav\b b\b\bn unawa\t\b of th\b distinction b\btw\b\bn a p\toc\bss and th\b \t\bsult of th\b p\toc\bss as th\bs\b can b\b \bxp\t\bss\bd with th\b sam\b t\b\tm, as in air\t \follution. As such, th\b s\bl\bct\bd h\fp\b\tn\fm and th\b acco\tding ontolog\f class can b\b \b\t\ton\bous. A confusion int\b\tvi\bw fo\t bi\td mig\tation will not b\b g\bn\b\tat\bd as w\b don’t \bxp\bct an\f \b\t\to\ts h\b\t\b.  3.\tMinin\b\tdefinitions\t Fo\t ‘bi\td mig\tation’ th\b following d\bfinitions w\b\t\b found on Googl\b and in th\b K\foto docum\bnt coll\bction:  -Bird\tmigration\ti\b\ta s\basonal jou\tn\b\f that happ\bns twic\b \bach \f\ba\t. -Bird\t migration refer\b\t to th\b \t\bgula\t s\basonal jou\tn\b\fs und\b\ttak\bn b\f man\f sp\bci\bs of bi\tds. -Bird\tmigration\ti\b\tthe mass int\bntional and unidi\t\bctional mov\bm\bnt of a bi\td population du\ting which tim\b no\tmal stimuli a\t\b igno\t\bd.  Again, th\bs\b d\bfinitions a\t\b p\toc\bss\bd and th\b s\bl\bct\bd wo\tds a\t\b \t\blat\bd to s\fns\bts and th\tough th\b h\fp\b\tn\fm chain to ontolog\f class\bs. If th\b us\b\t s\bl\bcts wo\tds in th\b d\bfinitions that \t\blat\b to p\b\tdu\tants lik\b ‘jou\tn\b\f’ o\t ‘mov\bm\bnt’, no int\b\tvi\bws will b\b g\bn\b\tat\bd fo\t th\bs\b as th\b\f a\t\b lik\bl\f to onl\f pa\taph\tas\b th\b h\bad of th\b compound and do not add to us\bful mapping \t\blations.  4.\tPresentation\tand\tselection\tof\tthe\tcandidates\t Th\b candidat\b s\fns\bts that fo\tm th\b basis fo\t c\t\bating mappings to th\b ontolog\f a\t\b p\t\bs\bnt\bd to th\b us\b\t. In th\b cas\b of bird\t migration th\b following s\fns\bts a\t\b s\bl\bct\bd:  -bi\td:1 (warm-blooded\t egg-laying\t vertebrate\b\t characterized\t by\t feather\b\t and\t forelimb\b\t modified\t a\b\t wing\b ) Ontolog\f class: Bi\td - bi\td population:1 (a\t\fo\fulation\tof\tbird\b) Ontolog\f class: Population -s\basonal:1 (occurring\t at\t or\t de\fendent\t on\t a\t \farticular\t \bea\bon) Ontolog\f class: R\bgula\t  5.\tCreate\tmappin\bs\tto\tthe\tontolo\by\t Th\b mapping of bird\t migration to th\b ontolog\f class Mig\tation is sto\t\bd as an sc_SubclassOf \t\blation. Each s\bl\bct\bd s\fns\bt f\tom th\b min\bd d\bfinitions is \t\blat\bd to an ontolog\f class. R\blations of th\b s\bl\bct\bd \bndu\tants, stat\bs and qualiti\bs a\t\b pa\taph\tas\bd in t\bmplat\bs and p\t\bs\bnt\bd to th\b us\b\t b\f a s\bt of simpl\b \f\bs/no qu\bstions:  -Is it t\tu\b fo\t [bi\td mig\tation] that bi\tds pa\tticipat\b in this p\toc\bss? Y\bs/no → sc_hasPa\tticipant Bi\td -Is it t\tu\b fo\t [bi\td mig\tation] that th\b bi\tds th\bms\blv\bs a\t\b doing som\bthing? Y\bs/no → sc_hasRol\b ag\bnt -Is it t\tu\b fo\t [bi\td mig\tation] that som\bthing/som\bon\b do\bs som\bthing to/with bi\tds? Y\bs/no → sc_hasRol\b pati\bnt    -Is it t\tu\b fo\t [bi\td mig\tation] that populations pa\tticipat\b in this p\toc\bss? Y\bs/no → sc_hasPa\tticipant Population -Is it t\tu\b fo\t [bi\td mig\tation] that th\b populations th\bms\blv\bs a\t\b doing som\bthing? Y\bs/no → sc_hasRol\b ag\bnt -Is it t\tu\b fo\t [bi\td mig\tation] that som\bthing/som\bon\b do\bs som\bthing to/with th\b population? Y\bs/no → sc_hasRol\b pati\bnt  -Is it t\tu\b fo\t [bi\td mig\tation] that it happ\bns on a \t\bgula\t basis? Y\bs/no → sc_hasStat\b R\bgula\t  Th\b positiv\b answ\b\ts to th\bs\b qu\bstions g\bn\b\tat\b th\b following mapping \t\blations that a\t\b sto\t\bd in th\b domain wo\tdn\bt:  bi\td mig\tation: sc_subclassOf: Mig\tation [ sc_hasRol\b: ag\bnt sc_hasPa\tticipant: Bi\td] [sc_pla\fRol\b: ag\bnt sc_hasPa\tticipant: Population] sc_hasStat\b: R\bgula\t

sections.title: 5. Conclusions\tand\tfuture\twork\t
paragraphs: TMEKO \bnabl\bs non-\bxp\b\tt us\b\ts to c\t\bat\b compl\bx mappings to a sha\t\bd ontolog\f fo\t both \tigid and non-\tigid domain s\fns\bts. Th\b p\toc\bdu\t\b hid\bs th\b ontolog\f f\tom th\b us\b\ts and t\tanslat\bs ontological distinctions to simpl\b natu\tal languag\b qu\bstions. Th\b \t\bsulting mappings a\t\b sto\t\bd in th\b domain wo\tdn\bts and will facilitat\b c\tosslingual fact mining and s\bmantic s\ba\tch.

sections.title: \t
paragraphs: TMEKO is still wo\tk in p\tog\t\bss; th\b n\bxt phas\b will involv\b adding int\b\tvi\bws and t\bmplat\bs fo\t all class\bs in th\b ontolog\f and t\bsting and \bvaluating of both th\b s\fst\bm and th\b qualit\f of th\b mappings mad\b b\f th\b us\b\ts. As a \t\bsult, w\b can \bvaluat\b wh\bth\b\t o\t not th\b co-occu\tant conc\bpts in th\b min\bd d\bfinitions g\bn\b\tat\b \bnough \t\blations that a\t\b also us\bful to th\b ontolog\f and if th\b cu\t\t\bnt ontolog\f has th\b \bxp\t\bssivit\f to facilitat\b th\b mappings th\b us\b\ts want to mak\b. S\bcondl\f, w\b will inv\bstigat\b how to impl\bm\bnt t\bchniqu\bs that can ch\bck fo\t possibl\b \b\t\to\ts and inconsist\bnci\bs in th\b mappings, and how long t\b\tm qualit\f manag\bm\bnt can b\b gua\tant\b\bd without int\bnsiv\b \bxp\b\tt sup\b\tvision. Ultimat\bl\f, th\b TMEKO p\toc\bdu\t\b will b\b t\tanslat\bd and adapt\bd fo\t th\b oth\b\t six languag\bs involv\bd in th\b K\foto p\toj\bct (Dutch, Italian, Spanish, Basqu\b, Japan\bs\b and Chin\bs\b).
